verses.verse: And it came to pass, that after <S%H6256><s%> the year <S%H8141><s%> was expired <S%H8666><s%>, at the time <S%H6256><s%> that kings <S%H4428><s%> go out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8800><s%> to battle, Yo'av <S%H3097><s%> led forth <S%H5090><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the power <S%H2428><s%> of the army <S%H6635><s%>, and wasted <S%H7843><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the country <S%H776><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%>, and came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and besieged <S%H6696><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Rabbah <S%H7237><s%>. But David <S%H1732><s%> tarried <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> at Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>. And Yo'av <S%H3097><s%> smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8686><s%> Rabbah <S%H7237><s%>, and destroyed <S%H2040><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it.

And David <S%H1732><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the crown <S%H5850><s%> of their king <S%H4428><s%> from off his head <S%H7218><s%>, and found <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it to weigh <S%H4948><s%> a talent <S%H3603><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%>, and there were precious <S%H3368><s%> stones <S%H68><s%> in it; and it was set upon David's <S%H1732><s%> head <S%H7218><s%>: and he brought <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8689><s%> also exceeding <S%H3966><s%> much <S%H7235><s%> <S%H8687><s%> spoil <S%H7998><s%> out of the city <S%H5892><s%>.

And he brought out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> that were in it, and cut <S%H7787><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them with saws <S%H4050><s%>, and with harrows <S%H2757><s%> of iron <S%H1270><s%>, and with axes <S%H4050><s%>. Havahn so dealt <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> with all the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%>. And David <S%H1732><s%> and all the people <S%H5971><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>.

And it came to pass after this <S%H310><s%>, that there arose <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8799><s%> war <S%H4421><s%> at Gezer <S%H1507><s%> with the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>; at which time <S%H227><s%> Sibbechai <S%H5444><s%> the Hushathite <S%H2843><s%> slew <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8689><s%> Sippai <S%H5598><s%>, that was of the children <S%H3211><s%> of the giant <S%H7497><s%>: and they were subdued <S%H3665><s%> <S%H8735><s%>.

And there was war <S%H4421><s%> again with the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>; and Elhanan <S%H445><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jair <S%H3265><s%> slew <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8686><s%> Lahmi <S%H3902><s%> the brother <S%H251><s%> of Goliath <S%H1555><s%> the Gittite <S%H1663><s%>, whose spear <S%H2595><s%> staff <S%H6086><s%> was like a weaver's <S%H707><s%> <S%H8802><s%> beam <S%H4500><s%>.

And yet again there was war <S%H4421><s%> at Gat <S%H1661><s%>, where was a man <S%H376><s%> of great stature <S%H4060><s%>, whose fingers <S%H676><s%> and toes <S%H676><s%> were four <S%H702><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%>, six <S%H8337><s%> on each hand, and six <S%H8337><s%> on each foot: and he also was the son <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8738><s%> of the giant <S%H7497><s%>.

But when he defied <S%H2778><s%> <S%H8762><s%> Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, Y'honatan <S%H3083><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shimea <S%H8092><s%> David's <S%H1732><s%> brother <S%H251><s%> slew <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8686><s%> him.

These <S%H411><s%> were born <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8738><s%> unto the giant <S%H7497><s%> in Gat <S%H1661><s%>; and they fell <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8799><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>, and by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of his servants <S%H5650><s%>.
